payload.title: Audit Execution Adapter to Perfect Score
payload.description: Audit execution_adapter.md using adapter-designer criteria. Elevate from 7.4/10 to 10.0/10 perfection by adding: detailed specification of 4 methods, complete data types (ExecutionPayload with metadata for agent tracking), 10 specific EARS, Testing Strategy section, Cross References, graceful degradation, <30ms performance.
payload.notes: Significant improvement transforming basic adapter into standard of elegant simplicity with rich metadata for AI tracking.
